title: Can AI Curation Overcome the AI Threat to Artistic Authenticity?
description: In a daring experiment at Duke University’s Nasher Museum of Art, curators have ventured into uncharted territory by allowing artificial intelligence to take the reins in organizing their latest exhibition. title: China’s central bank acts to stabilize yuan amidst a 16-year low
description: On Monday, China’s central bank, the People’s Bank of China (PBOC), intervened to pull the yuan away from its 16-year low against the dollar. The PBOC established a daily midpoint guidance rate, which dictates the yuan trade range. The new rate was set at 7.2148 yuan per dollar, indicating a stronger bias than the previous ... Read more
